sn35.160:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati jivakambavane.
sn35.160:1.7: Cakkhum aniccanti yathabhutam okkhayati, rupa aniccati yathabhutam okkhayati, cakkhuvinnanam aniccanti yathabhutam okkhayati, cakkhusamphasso aniccoti yathabhutam okkhayati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccanti yathabhutam okkhayati …pe…
sn35.160:1.9: mano aniccoti yathabhutam okkhayati, dhamma aniccati yathabhutam okkhayati …pe…
sn35.160:1.10: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccanti yathabhutam okkhayati.
